libcimbar (MPL-2.0)

Source: https://github.com/sz3/libcimbar
Release: v0.6.3

This project uses the prebuilt `cimbar.wasm.tar.gz` release asset.
The build script `scripts/build_wasm_cimbar.sh` downloads the release
bundle and extracts `cimbar_js.js` + `cimbar_js.wasm` into
`web/receiver-pwa/public/wasm/cimbar`.
